mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_CHECK (CHECK_DATE, STATUS, MEM_CODE) VALUES ( #{checkDate}, #{status}, #{memCode} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_CODE, MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_MAIL, MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMER_PHONE, MEM_ADDR1, MEM_ADDR2, MEM_ADDR3, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_JOIN_DATE, MEM_QUIT_DATE, MEM_STATUS, MEM_TOTAL_POINT, MEM_ADMIN_CHECK FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_CODE=#{memCode}
SELECT POINT_CODE,POINT_PRICE,POINT_DATE ,POINT_COMMENT,POINT_STATUS,MEM_CODE FROM TB_POINT WHERE MEM_CODE=#{memCode} AND TO_CHAR(POINT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')=#{selectDate}
